name: Solarstar
description:
Solarstar is a simple game.

A game about planets and observation.


Control the distance of the planets from their sun.

Listen as they sing to you.


Watch. Listen. Love.

Reform. Repeat.


Generate random solar systems with various palettes. Headphones recommended.

Available on Windows, OSX, and Linux running PCs.

Inspired by takorii's game SUNROSE (link)

update 1- minor bugfix, more colour palettes (now 23 palettes).

update 2- Coming J̶u̶n̶e̶/̶J̶u̶l̶y̶ when it's ready with various improvements to EVERYTHING
